title: Fourier Series
description: A suite of Imperial Visualisations demonstrating how any arbitrary periodic function can be decomposed into a trigonometric series.

guidance.introduction: Welcome to Imperial Visualisation Fourier Suite! Here you will learn how to decompose periodic functions into a trigonometric series. Click the instructions to get started!
instructions: The introduction tab here shows us how and why we can decompose a function into its fourier series in the first place.
The other tabs derive the fourier coefficients for simple periodic functions, such as a sawtooth function.

guidance.introduction: Now that we have derived the fourier coefficients for simple periodic functions, let's now see how the terms sum to give our original function.
